transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
Ally Speed +2 every turn (Max 5 stacks, same effect cannot stack)
Reduces Skill Cooldown of the ally with the highest Attack by 1 turn after using Repent! in Mandala state
Chain Passive WG Reduction +1
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
毎ターン味方のスピード+2
(最大5回累積、同じ効果重複不可)
曼荼羅状態で懺悔なさい!使用後、攻撃力が最も高い味方のスキルターン-1ターン
チェーンパッシブのWG減少量+1
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
매 턴 아군 속도 +2 (최대 5회 누적, 같은 효과 중첩 불가)
만다라 상태에서 참회하세요! 사용 후 공격력 가장 높은 아군 스킬 쿨타임 -1턴
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
每回合友军速度+2(最多叠加5次/相同效果不可叠加)
曼荼罗状态下使用忏悔吧!后,攻击力最高的友军技能冷却时间-1回合
连锁被动的WG减少量+1
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Unlocks Burst Stage 3
AP +50 upon entry
Ally Attack +7% every turn (Max 5 stacks)
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バースト3段階解禁
入場時AP+50
毎ターン味方の攻撃力+7%(最大5回累積)
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +50
매 턴 아군 공격력 +7% (최대 5회 누적)
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁爆发第3阶段
入场时AP+50
每回合友军攻击力+7%(最多叠加5次)
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
Ally Damage Dealt +10% every turn (Max 5 stacks)
Enemy cannot Counterattack/Revenge/Swift Response immediately after attack
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
毎ターン味方の与えるダメージ+10%(最大5回累積)
攻撃直後、敵は反撃/復讐/迅速対応不可
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
매 턴 아군 피해량 증가 +10% (최대 5회 누적)
공격 직후 적의 반격/복수/신속 대응 불가
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
每回合友军伤害量+10%(最多叠加5次)
攻击后敌人无法进行反击/复仇/迅速应对

SKT_FIRST.name: Repent!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy, dealing fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> of the target's Max Health. The damage of this skill increases by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> with every use. (up to 5 stacks)

While in <color=#28d9ed>Mandala</color> state, each attack reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> (up to 5 stacks, ignores Resilience and Immunity).

<color=#FF007F>When attacking with an Extra Attack, ignores Talisman effects that require attacking as a condition.</color>
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵を攻撃し、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>分の固定ダメージを与える。このスキルは使用するたびにダメージが<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。(最大5回累積)

<color=#28d9ed>曼荼羅</color>状態では、攻撃するたびに対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>-5%</color>DOWNさせる。(最大5回累積、効果抵抗および免疫無視)

<color=#FF007F>追加攻撃時、攻撃を条件とするタリスマンの効果は無視される。</color>
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격하고, 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힙니다. 이 스킬은 사용할 때마다 피해가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.(최대 5회 누적)

<color=#28d9ed>만다라</color> 상태에서는 공격 시마다 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>-5%</color> 감소시킵니다.(최대 5회 누적, 효과 저항 및 면역 무시)

<color=#FF007F>추가타로 공격 시에는 공격을 조건으로 하는 탈리스만의 효과가 무시됩니다.</color>
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh:
攻击敌人,并造成相当于目标最大生命值<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>的固定伤害。该技能每次使用时,伤害量增加<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。(最多叠加5次)

处于<color=#28d9ed>曼荼罗</color>状态下,每次攻击都会使目标的<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低<color=#28d9ed>-5%</color>。(最多叠加5次,无视效果抵抗及免疫)

<color=#FF007F>发动额外攻击时,无视以攻击为触发条件的护身符效果。</color>

4: Fixed damage equal to 1% of target's Max HP
4_jp: 対象の最大HP比例の固定ダメージ+1%
4_zh: 目标最大生命值固定伤害+1%

SKT_SECOND.name: Time of Enlightenment
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) The caster is unaffected by <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color>, and enters battle with <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

(Active Effect) Increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies except the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, grants the caster <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and applies <color=#28d9ed>Mandala</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
If there is an enemy with WG, reduces their <color=#28d9ed>WG</color> by <color=#28d9ed>2</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果) <color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>の影響を受けず、戦闘開始時、<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>状態になる。

(アクティブ効果) 自分を除く味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>増加させ、自分は<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>状態になり、自分に<color=#28d9ed>曼荼羅</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
スキル使用中、WGを持つ敵がいる場合、対象の<color=#28d9ed>WG</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2</color>DOWNさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color>의 영향을 받지 않으며, 전투 입장 시 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color> 상태가 됩니다.

(엑티브 효과) 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가하고, 자신은 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color> 상태가 되며 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>만다라</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 발생시킵니다.
스킬 시전 중 WG를 보유한 적이 있다면 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>WG</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果) 不受<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>影响,进入战斗时,进入<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

(主动效果) 使除自身外全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>增加<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,自身进入<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并赋予自身<color=#28d9ed>曼荼罗</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。
施展技能时,若存在持有WG的敌人,则使目标的<color=#28d9ed>WG</color>减少<color=#28d9ed>2</color>。

4_jp: 味方の行動ゲージ+5%(自分を除く)
5_jp: 味方の行動ゲージ+10%(自分を除く)

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 味方の行動ゲージ+10%(自分を除く)\n味方の攻撃力+1ターン
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 友军行动值+10%(自身除外)\n友军攻击力+1回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Resets Cooldown of Sacred Paw\n+10 Chain Points Recovery
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 猫來神掌のスキルターン初期化\nCP 獲得+10
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 重置猫来神掌的冷却时间\nCP恢复+10

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Sacred Paw
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Before attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to decrease all enemies' <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> by <color=#28d9ed>30</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. (Ignores Resilience)\n\nThis attack ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense, restores <color=#28d9ed>10</color> <color=#28d9ed>Chain Points</color>, and grants an <color=#28d9ed>Extra Turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 攻撃前にそれぞれ<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30</color>、<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせた後、敵全体を攻撃する。(効果抵抗無視)\n\nこの攻撃は敵の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視し、攻撃後に<color=#28d9ed>CP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10</color>回復し、<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 공격 전 각 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>30</color>,  <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킨 뒤 적 전체를 공격합니다.(효과 저항 무시)\n\n해당 공격은 적의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시하며 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>CP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>10</color> 회복하고 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击前,各有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的几率使全体敌人的<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>减少<color=#28d9ed>30</color>、<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,随后攻击全体敌人。(无视效果抵抗)\n\n该攻击无视敌人<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的防御力,攻击后恢复<color=#28d9ed>10</color>点<color=#28d9ed>CP</color>,并获得<color=#28d9ed>额外回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally decreases WG by <color=#28d9ed>5</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, deals fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> of the target's Max Health.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーンフィニッシュ効果</color>:攻撃後、WGを<color=#28d9ed>5</color>追加でDOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>分の固定ダメージを与える。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>5</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힙니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连锁终结效果</color>:攻击后,额外减少<color=#28d9ed>5</color>点WG。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,造成相当于目标最大生命值<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>的固定伤害。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
